results.name: First numerator and then denominator in a fraction expansion of log(2) - Pi/8.
reference: Mohammad K. Azarian, Problem 1218, Pi Mu Epsilon Journal, Vol. 13, No. 2, Spring 2010, p. 116.  Solution published in Vol. 13, No. 3, Fall 2010, pp. 183-185.

results.author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_, Sep 26 2011
